EmailTemplate.description: HTML general template for The Challenge Society
EmailTemplate.name: Music Potential Info and Map
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Information about Music Potential!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Tomorrow is time for the amazing Music Potential! I hope you are getting excited!
I've attached a map to Birmingham Ormiston Academy (BOA). You need to be there for 12pm to sign-in on Wednesday 29th August.
Just look for the staff in Challenge hoodies!
Spaces are very limited, please let me know if you'd like a space ASAP by texting 'YES' and your full name to 07805396756.
Set to be an incredible end to your Summer!
WWW.THE-CHALLENGE.ORG/GRADUATES /thechallengesociety
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
